name: Ultra Rush: A Synthwave Racer
description:
An endless-runner in a synthwave universe!

Ultra rush is available in 3 distinct game modes. First choose your vehicle and your custom stage set then PLAY.

Endless mode:

Nothing could be more classic. An endless runner where you have to dodge obstacles. The goal is to get the highest score possible.

Chill mode:

Put on your custom mp3s and let the game play by itself as it reacts to the sound. This mode can be used to make your children play or to have a synthwave screensaver with your decorations.

Musical mode: WARNING. THIS MODE IS STILL IN DEVELOPMENT.

This video is a preview of the music mode in its final rendering.

For the moment you only have 2 "levels" available and which encounter many bugs. I have 5 much better modeled levels with various corrections to be made later, but I thought that giving you a playable preview will allow you to judge the game mode. (The tutorial is in French and is intended for smartphones). Don't worry, I'm working on it for you.

Many customization elements are in development. 



USE ARROWS KEYS TO MOVE. SPACE TO LAUNCH THE RACE. 

Do not hesitate to give me your feedback (bugs encountered or ideas for improvement) in the comments or by email: ultrarushgame@gmail.com

This game is also available on the play store.

Donations are greatly appreciated to improve the game.
